channel.title: STALKER SOC Help
channel.description:
hey, I need a bit of help here, Every time I try to start up S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Shadow of Chernobyl after adding an essential file for mods into the directory, it crashes I checked the Crashlog and here's what's coming up [quote] FATAL ERROR
[error]Expression : xml_doc.NavigateToNode(path,index) [error]Function : CUIXmlInit::InitStatic [error]File : E:\stalker\sources\trunk\xr_3da\xrGame\ui\UIXmlInit.cpp [error]Line : 172 [error]Description : XML node not found [error]Arguments : msg_box_kicked_by_server:picture
stack trace: [/quote] anybody got any idea what i should do?

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: Charchar
item.description:
This wasn’t worth making another thread, so I’ll ask here

Does anyone knows if there’s any GOOD 3rd person camera mod for any game of the series?..I’ve seen a few on youtube, for SOC and CS, nothing for COP, but most of them have problems with the AIMING , I don’t know which ones are the best, or if there is any way to fix those things?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
verify with steam, then install the complete mod. Only thing you’ll ever need.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
I’ll try what Jotie said, I think the “gamedata” folder generated by STALKER unpacker had a bad file or two in it…
EDIT
I’ll Be damned, that WAS the problem. if a moderator would be so kind, this thread is now insignificant.
Thanks for the help!

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Tell us exactly what you did and what mod you installed. What is this essential file for mods? The change on the line “game_data” of your fsgame.ltx or something?

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: Jotie
item.description:
Try running verifying game cache files through steam.

Another possible solution would be to delete everything from your gamedate folder (dont forget to back-up if you do this!).

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER SOC Help
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
hey, I need a bit of help here, Every time I try to start up S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Shadow of Chernobyl after adding an essential file for mods into the directory, it crashes I checked the Crashlog and here’s what’s coming up

FATAL ERROR

[error]Expression : xml_doc.NavigateToNode(path,index)
[error]Function : CUIXmlInit::InitStatic
[error]File : E:\stalker\sources\trunk\xr_3da\xrGame\ui\UIXmlInit.cpp
[error]Line : 172
[error]Description : XML node not found
[error]Arguments : msg_box_kicked_by_server:picture

stack trace:

anybody got any idea what i should do?

Read full topic
